Compute Spacing Measuring Vectors

space_measuring_vectors.Rd

This function is used to compute vectors from spaces to measure the function data objects.

Usage

space_measuring_vectors(X, M = 20, space = "BM")

Arguments

X

A dfts object or data which can be automatically converted to that format. See dfts().

M

Integer for the number of vectors to generate

space

String for the space of interest. Options are Brownian motion ('BM'), OU process ('OU'), principal components ('PC'), and a vectors in iid standard, random normals ('RN').

Value

Data.frame with columns of vectors describing the space. Columns are independent vectors.

Examples

space_measuring_vectors(M=10, space="BM", X=electricity)
